mapper.select: select id, nodename, nodetype, regioncode, telcode, x, y from transnode where id=#{id};
select id, nodename, nodetype, regioncode, telcode, x, y from transnode where RegionCode=#{regioncode} and NodeType=#{type};
mapper.insert: insert into transnode(id, nodename, nodetype, regioncode, telcode, x, y) VALUES (#{id},#{nodeName} #{nodeType} #{regionCode} #{telCode} #{x} #{y});
